entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:39 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.0°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 2.0 km

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
